html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(4) > footer:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(3) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(4) > footer:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(6) > h6:nth-child(2)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > shopify-drawers:nth-child(5) > div:nth-child(2) > shopify-cart > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > shopify-drawers:nth-child(5) > div:nth-child(2) > shopify-cart > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > h5:nth-child(1)
